author: Retro Island Gaming

text:
I just don't understand these RPG companies. They do these remakes, these "sequels", all "stylized" to look like NES or SNES, but they make the character designs SO generic. They look straight out of RPG Maker, which is pretty awful for a major company like Capcom or SquareEnix. I don't get it. Have any all forgotten how to do quality sprite-art? It's so frustrating.

Thanks for the memories.

text: Did you guys see those first screenshots of Breath of Fire VI? It's a mobile game and it looks like those billion other uninspired free to play games. Couldn't they call it Breath of Fire Mobile and make a proper #6 on consoles? Such a shame, Capcom.
